description: This file defines a class PubmedTools that provides methods to search and fetch articles from PubMed using NCBI's eUtils API. It includes functions for querying, parsing XML responses, and formatting article metadata.

classes.name: PubmedTools
classes.description: A class that provides tools to search and retrieve articles from PubMed, including methods for querying, parsing XML responses, and formatting results.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Constructor initializing the PubmedTools instance with email, max_results, and results_expanded options.

methods.name: fetch_pubmed_ids
methods.description: Fetches PubMed IDs based on a search query using NCBI's esearch API.

methods.name: fetch_details
methods.description: Fetches detailed article data in XML format for given PubMed IDs.

methods.name: parse_details
methods.description: Parses the XML response from PubMed to extract article metadata such as title, authors, abstract, keywords, and URLs.

methods.name: search_pubmed
methods.description: Performs a search on PubMed with a query and returns formatted results as a JSON string.
